item.title: There is a large amount of construction waste which includes broken mirrors with sharp edges but also organic waste as it is smelly at times. This constitutes both a physical hazard & potential for rat infestation from the organic smelly waste., 31st August
item.description:
Possible dumping by company working at 266 & 268 Haggerston Rd E8 4EP as directly beyond the rear garden gate leading from one of the 2 scaffolded properties. It has been present for over 1 month & the council has done nothing to protect residents.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Haggerston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
